@xanderlavery @HandballHour @RasmusBoysen92 And, you're missing some fundamental differences
‚ñ∂Ô∏èA shooting foul in hoops is always rewarded with free throws
‚ñ∂Ô∏èA hard foul in handball results in 2 minutes...that's pretty harsh compared to hoops
‚ñ∂Ô∏èSometimes a foul in the act of shooting just means the team gets the ball back
@HandballHour The "quint-double" is not a "thing" and god willing, never will be

@xanderlavery @HandballHour @RasmusBoysen92 I was on the soapbox for this very issue for many years

‚ñ∂Ô∏èThe obvious, simple solution is to copy basketball.

‚ñ∂Ô∏èCommunity based clubs rarely, if ever, evolve into a pro team

‚ñ∂Ô∏èOur system is just different.  It just is.
